member.name: T:XmlDocCar.SimpleCar
member.summary: This is a simple Car which illustrates working with XML style documentation.

member.name: M:XmlDocCar.SimpleCar.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: The ctor lets you set the sunroofedness.

member.name: M:XmlDocCar.SimpleCar.OpenSunroof(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method allows you to open your sunroof.
